                    java.lang.String type)
        adds a new dish to the restaurant menu
        Parameters:
        dishType - : "starter", "mainDish" or "dessert"
        name - : the name of the dish
        price - : the price of the dish
        type - : the type of dish "standard", "vegetarian" or "glutenFree"
